name: Task Get Results
description: Retrieve results from a Parallel.ai research task using its run_id. Polls for task completion and returns research results with structured data and citations. Use after 'Task Create'.

inputs.title: Parallel API Key
inputs.description: Your Parallel.ai API key for authenticating requests.

inputs.title: Task Run ID
inputs.description: The run_id returned from 'Task Create'. This identifies the specific research task to retrieve results for.

inputs.title: Timeout (seconds)
inputs.description: Maximum time to wait for task completion. Advanced processors may require up to 15 minutes.
